website_summaries.verdict: An exceptional pellet grill for those looking to explore the widest range of backyard smoking and grilling possibilities.
pros: Easy to use, and cleans up well
Gets high praise for its fire temperature control, as well as its ability to smoke at very low or grill at very high temperatures
Offers 700 square inches of cook space
cons: Exterior paint peels after some use
Some reports of grills that quit working properly within a fairly short time of ownership

customer_reviews.title: Pit boss
customer_reviews.text: This is the best investment we've ever made. I'd reccomend this pit to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Shortner

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!!
customer_reviews.text: My parents and I got my husband this grill for Christmas. We live in the deep south so the weather allows for grilling even in the winter (at times). We have used it many times and live it. The meat is tender and very juicy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grill love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it never use my gas grill anymore cause everything is better tasting on this
customer_reviews.author: Petey woods

customer_reviews.title: Let it heat up to temperature before putting the food on it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. I got the hickory smoked pellets at my local farm store, everything I have cooked on this grill is sooooo good. Love it love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: excelent product
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Sturdy build good temp control. I have used this smoker/grill about 12-15 times in the past 3 months. It performs great. I just wish it had an easy to dump ash catch.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Pit Grill
customer_reviews.text: The Pit Boss is phenomenal! Steaks, chicken, and vegetables are extremely tasty and makes cooking easier.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Brints

customer_reviews.title: It's a great smoker
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my pit boss. The temperature is very well controlled.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Beckley

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine from lowes and after less than a year of owning it is junk. Dont get me wrong it was awesome for awhile, but should last at least a year. First the feeder has over filled multiple times causing the whole bottom of the pit to fill with pellets and catch on fire. The thing had literally exploded on several occasions. First time I had problems I thought maybe I am not cleaning well enough. So I has started cleaning it completely from top to bottom before starting a cook. Does not help. Have since looked in to and have seen multiple reviews with similar issues. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Thomas p.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy from pinnacle LLC
customer_reviews.text: The seller sent out a Cheap or smallerNot the right product pinnacle LLC
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Higher Temps Than a Traeger
customer_reviews.text: I have been grilling with pellet grills for eight years. I started out with a traeger jr, & then a traeger Texas. I like the size of this grill the best. I like the design of the drip pan, because it will allow you to seer steaks and burgers. I cooked two large pork tenderloins, & found the meat probe extremely helpful. I started out with a high temp seer, & then closed up the pan for indirect heat. The meat had a nice crust and just enough smoke flavor. I can tell i’M going to love this grill.
customer_reviews.author: smurphy

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF JUNK. Wont stop tripping breakers.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. I did the initial burn in and that was fine. Once i started it up again 2 hours latee it kept tripping breakers. Tried 3 separate circuits and 2 had no other appliances. Googled the issue and apparently pretty common for pit boss grills. All this crap is cheaply made in China. The support for pit boss is terrible too. They dont stand by their product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I gotten it years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Ok I wish that I would of gotten this grill a long time ago. This grill is heavy duty built to last and the weight is like over hundred pounds. I cooked many types of food on it the best one that I like was the prime rib and turkey came out better than a restaurant quality. So if you get one you won’t be disappointed and the is a five year warranty on it if you register on line.
customer_reviews.author: Randy R

customer_reviews.title: Keep your machine clean and this smoker will produce impressive product every time!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Temp delta is minimal if you maintain the barrel and firepot regularly. I use this smoker for everything from slow cooking pork ribs to beef briskets, as well as chicken and turkey. They all turn out great with good time and tenderness management. The start up and shutdown process is simple as could be.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Talley

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing....
customer_reviews.text: After looking hard at the other major pellet grills...I chose this one and was absolutely blown away with the performance and quality of my BBQ....temp control is spot on...set it and forget it....makes excellent "wood fired" pizza as well...
customer_reviews.author: J. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Broken after one use Defective temp control board
customer_reviews.text: I got mine from walmart. I used it once. Easy to setup and use. Three days later had food prepared and ready to go. The electronic temp control board wouldn't work. Called company for support. Told me they would ship a new one within a week. Called a week later and was told the board are on back order and i would receive when they arrive. Still waiting.... I doubt that it will come. Saw reviews from others with the exact same issue. I should have looked at reviews before buying. Not a food buy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The open flame makes the best steaks I've ever eaten...
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I don't like about the grill, it makes great steaks, great BBQ ribs, pork loins, Boston pork butts, chicken and turkey.. I have a Weber Gas Grill and don't use it anymore since I got my Pit Boss...
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Unable to provide spare parts
customer_reviews.text: Pit boss unable to provide spare parts. Control board broke within 1 year, and unable to supply spare parts. its just awesome not having a grill during the summer
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Shop around for better price
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is that I found it for almost $200 less at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: MzDfy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have not found one thing I don't like about it! This is the only grill I will use from now on
customer_reviews.author: lisa

product_meta.title: Pit Boss Classic 700 sq. in. Wood Fired Pellet Grill & Smoker, Smoke, Bake, Roast, Braise and BBQ
product_meta.description: The Pit Boss 700 Series offers the best value per square inch in the pellet grill industry! The 700 Classic has been perfectly designed to be as versatile as it is practical. With 700 sq. inches of porcelain coated cooking surface including a second tier rack, the 700 Series is perfect for a group of four to six. These 8-in-1 grills range in cooking temperature from 180° to 500°F. Select your preferred cooking styles with the digital control board and standard flame broiler. Set it and forget it, or slide the plate and sear it over an open flame. No need for natural gas or propane—our wood pellet fuel produces an exceptional taste and is made of 100% Natural Hardwood Pellets. With heavy gauge steel components, complete structural strength and durability, these high-value grills are meant to last. Grill, smoke, bake, roast, sear, braise, barbeque or char-grill to perfection with the Pit Boss 700 Series. 700 sq in cooking surface with upper rack Porcelain coated wire cooking grids Digital control board with LED read-out 21 lb hopper capacity Innovative flame broiler for direct flame cooking Meat probe with LED read-out included Cooking temperature range 180-500 F High temperature powder coated steel
feature_bullets: Digital control board with LED read-out
Innovative flame broiler for direct flame cooking

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars33 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
